price: जिनके समान (दुनिया के) शहरों में कोई पैदा नहीं किया गया।
arabic: ٱلَّتِي لَمۡ يُخۡلَقۡ مِثۡلُهَا فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: allatī lam yukh'laq mith'luhā fī al-bilādi
